DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess proportion subject sucessfully achieve mean Hemoglobin great equal 11 g/dL evaluation period follow extension Weekly ( QW ) Once Every Other Week ( Q2W ) Darbepoetin Alfa administraion .
DOC.brief_title: Extension From Weekly Once Every Other Week Darbepoetin Alfa Administration Subjects With Chronic Kidney Disease Receiving Dialysis
DOC.criteria: Receiving dialysis 3 month enrollment . The mean 2 screen Hb value take least 7 day appart must great equal 11g/dL less equal 13.0 g/dL Receiving stable QW darbepoetin alfa dose least 6 week enrollment Adequate iron store ( serum ferritin equal great 100 ug/L Uncontrolled hypertension Prior history Cardiovascular Incidents 12 week prior enrollment Other hematological disorder Upper low GI bleed within prior 6 month
